result.markdown: --- title: "" --- ## Week 7 ### Day 1 #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Please bring your laptop today - Board work for statistical notation and JAGS syntax for Bayesian generalized linear models #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} ### Day 2 (lab) #### [Today]{style="color:red;"} - Discuss Project - Fit models specified in the previous class - Board work for statistical notation and JAGS syntax for hierarchical Bayesian generalized linear models - No lab to turn in next week. - Downloads: Bayesian Hierarchical Model Files - Install R packages: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} # CRAN packages install.packages(c("brms","bayesplot")) ``` ::: #### [Assigned]{style="color:red;"} - Readings for next class: - Widmer et al 2021 - Guillera‐Arroita et al. 2015 - Background Reading (not required): - Soley-Guardia et al. 2024 - Valavi et al. 2021 (assessment of modeling methods).
